Package com.vagsoft.bookstore.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.vagsoft.bookstore.controllers.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/users") @Validated(OrderedValidation.class) public class UserController extends Object
REST controller for endpoints related to users.

  • Method Details

    • getUsers

      @IsAdmin @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<UserReadDTO>> getUsers(@RequestParam(name="username",required=false) @Size(max=31,message="username must be less than 32 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) @NullOrNotBlank(groups=BasicValidation.class) @Size(max=31,message="username must be less than 32 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) String username, @RequestParam(name="email",required=false) @Size(max=320,message="email must be less than 321 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) @NullOrNotBlank(groups=BasicValidation.class) @Size(max=320,message="email must be less than 321 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) String email, @RequestParam(name="role",required=false) Role role, @RequestParam(name="firstName",required=false) @Size(max=31,message="firstName must be less than 32 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) @NullOrNotBlank(groups=BasicValidation.class) @Size(max=31,message="firstName must be less than 32 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) String firstName, @RequestParam(name="lastName",required=false) @Size(max=31,message="lastName must be less than 32 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) @NullOrNotBlank(groups=BasicValidation.class) @Size(max=31,message="lastName must be less than 32 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) String lastName, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a list of users filtered by the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the users to search for (optional)
      email - the email of the users to search for (optional)
      role - the role of the users to search for (optional)
      firstName - the first name of the users to search for (optional)
      lastName - the last name of the users to search for (optional)
      pageable - the pagination information (optional)
      Returns:
      a page of users

    • getUserByID

      @IsAdmin @GetMapping(path="/{userID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserReadDTO> getUserByID(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsResource(repository=UserRepository.class,message="User with given ID does not exist",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer userID)
      Retrieves a user by its ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the retrieved user

    • updateUserByID

      @IsAdmin @PutMapping(path="/{userID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserReadDTO> updateUserByID(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsResource(repository=UserRepository.class,message="User with given ID does not exist",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer userID, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid UserUpdateDTO userUpdateDTO)
